text: Lilian Adriana Tintori Parra (born 5 May 1978) is a Venezuelan activist, kitesurfer, television and radio host. Tintori is the wife of Leopoldo López. She has also led groups who criticize the government of Venezuelan President Nicolás Maduro. ==References== Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:Venezuelan entertainers Category:Venezuelan activists Category:Venezuelan sportspeople Category:Television presenters Category:Surfers
title: Lilian Tintori
